import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { Router } from '@angular/router'; import { jwtDecode } from 'jwt-decode'; type JwtPayload = { iat: number; exp: number; data: { id: number; name: string; type: string; }; }; @Component({ selector: 'app-header', templateUrl: './header.component.html', styleUrls: ['./header.component.scss'], }) export class HeaderComponent { constructor(public router: Router) {} menuOpen = false; user = ''; logout() { localStorage.removeItem('token'); } // decode token for get user id private decoded = jwtDecode(localStorage.getItem('token') ?? ''); ngOnInit(): void { this.user = this.decoded.data.name; } }
